thread.title: Deepika Padukone Looks Like A Million Bucks In This Behind-The-Scenes Video Of An Ad Shoot
thread.title_full: Deepika Padukone Looks Like A Million Bucks In This Behind-The-Scenes Video Of An Ad Shoot

author: Priyam Saha
title: Deepika Padukone Looks Like A Million Bucks In This Behind-The-Scenes Video Of An Ad Shoot
text:
Priyam Saha Mar . 24 . 2017 Deepika Padukone 
Deepika Padukone always manages to slay – with her style, with her acting chops and her smile. She’s the new brand ambassador for OPPO Camera Phone and the ad for it looks spectacular. Filmmaker Vinil Mathew , whose Hasee Toh Phasee we love, has directed this ad and DP looks like a million bucks in it. We got our hands on some behind the scenes footage of the ad shoot. 
As a selfie lover myself, I’m really digging this phone because the OPPO F3 Plus phone comes with dual selfie cameras! You know what that means, right? I can get some epic 16 megapixel selfies anytime, anywhere. And to top it all, there’s a special 120-degree wide-angle lens for group selfies! What more can we ask for? <3 Check it out! 
For information, follow OPPO on Twitter , Instagram and Facebook . 
This post is in partnership with OPPO. 11
